shape changer [shapechange]: â‡” #3268 Bakeneko

magic paths [mpath]: U1 R7

#nametype [nametype]: 134
The Bakeneko is a ghost cat of Shinuyama, a cat that has lived for decades and developed shapeshifting abilities and magical powers. Some are prone to setting things on fire, others reanimate dead corpses to use in their nefarious schemes. Bakeneko are attuned to magic and their powers are greater in lands of magic.
